question:
The pie charts below show the most common advantages and disadvantages of Bowen Island, according to a survey of visitors.

Summarise the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.
text: The two charts of a survey show the most common merits and demerits of visiting Bowen island according to visitors.

Overall, high cost of living is the primary disadvantage of visiting Bowen Island. In contrast, most of them feel that the local people are very friendly. On the whole, people felt that culture, accommodation, scenery and the people are the primary pros of the Island. On the other hand, bad weather, high cost of living, entertainment and food are major cons of visiting the island.

Forty-two percent of the people said they like the hospitality of the Island. Around one-third of the people who completed the survey said that the scenery of the Island was magnificent. Visitors felt that culture was slightly better than the accommodation at 12% and 11% respectively.

Half of the people who completed the survey agreed that the high cost of living is the primary drawback of the island, followed by a quarter of participants said that the Island has entertainment problems. Subsequently, 15% of the respondents felt that the Island has bad weather. Finally, one tenth of the participants had food problems in the Island.
